event.title: GSoC Alumni Summit 2025
event.Overview: Join us in the 2025 of our GSoC Alumni Summit! This will be our 9th year participating in GSoC, and we'll take the opportunity to bring past contributors and students to share their experiences in this virtual event - with an intro by our own founder and project leader, Gabriel Engel.
